Package com.example.aventurasdemarcoyluis.controller.GameStates

package com.example.aventurasdemarcoyluis.controller.GameStates
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    IGameStates
    Interface that defines the methods for the game states
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    AbstractGameState
    A game state represent the different states of the game which you can select player, select the attack, or use one item an receive attacks from the enemies
    EnemiesTurn
    This class represent s the state of the game when the enemies are attacking the player.
    HammerAttackTurn
    This game state is used when the player is attacking an enemy with the Hammer.
    LoseState
    This class is the state of the game when the player loses.
    NormalAttackTurn
    This game state is used when the player is attacking an enemy with a normal attack.
    SelectAction
    This class is the state of the game when the player is selecting an action.
    UseItem
    This class represents the state of the game when the player is using an item.
    WinState
    This class represents the win state of the game.
